subject: RE: VisitorTrack appId - BACKEND READY on TEST
body:
Sarah,

Backend updated and deployed to TEST.

**Changes:**
- VisitorTrack.js now captures appId from request
- Stores in VisitorTrackingHistory (per visit)
- Stores in VisitorTrackingAnalytics (most recent app)
- Backwards compatible: null for old records

**Commit:** bd25d49c
**Branch:** Pushed to DEVL + TEST
**Deploy:** CI/CD auto-deploying to calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net

You're clear to deploy tangotiempo.com v1.19.20 to PROD whenever ready.

- Fulton
